{"id":810227448,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1664329473,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1706 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/810227448/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"18.1 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def threeSum(self, nums: List[int]) -> List[List[int]]:\n        nums.sort()\n        ans=[]\n        \n        for i,val in enumerate(nums):\n            if i>0 and nums[i]==nums[i-1]:\n                continue\n                \n            l,r=i+1,len(nums)-1\n            while l<r:\n                threeSum=val+nums[l]+nums[r]\n                if threeSum>0:\n                    r-=1\n                elif threeSum<0:\n                    l+=1\n                else:\n                    ans.append([val,nums[l],nums[r]])\n                    l+=1\n                    while l<r and nums[l]==nums[l-1]:\n                        l+=1\n        return ans","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
